attributes.action: A petition by Humberston Fitties Residents requesting the Secretary of State to investigate an alleged abuse of power by NEL Council
attributes.additional_details: I would like to request the Secretary of State for Communities and Local Government to intervene on behalf of Humberston Fitties Chalet Park Residents in Grimsby, North East Lincolnshire. After having read about their plight and the unfair treatment by North East Lincolnshire Council who are also their landlords, I believe that if true, the Council is acting in a biased, underhand and undemocratic manner showing a complete abuse of its power and a total abdication of the Council's responsibilities with regards to upholding the democratic rights of its constituents.
